Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: There is no shortage of delicious vegan food in Amsterdam. However, VIA is the BEST place in the entire city. When I came to Amsterdam five years ago, I loved this place. I returned this week and found it again on a walk near the Anne Frank ‚Ä¶

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: The pizza was amazing .... the staff were terrific ... the service and the cooking time were absolutely flawless. Pair of lovely girls running the place made the pizza even more enjoyable ... I will recommend everyone visiting Amsterdam to pay them a visit. A*******

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Margherita pizza... with literally two leafs of basil. The veggie pizza was pretty tasty, but doesn't make up for the blatant margherita mishap.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: The pizzas are really tasty, however I had come before and really liked it but I think now it is run by different people and I am a bit disappointed.  I bought a "normal" size pizza for 12.50 and it turned out to be the size of an ‚Ä¶

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: This is one of several wood fired pizzerias by the same name and owner. The place is tiny. There is a small counter along the window facing the street with four seats....thats the entire capacity of the place. You step in, order your pizza ‚Ä¶

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: The tomato sauce is super tasty. Staff friendly and gives good advices.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: The pizza was fantastic; the ingredients seem to be high-quality, everything tasted quite good, and the portion size was perfect to leave me sated but not sluggish (I had one normal pizza, which is four slices). No complaints about the ‚Ä¶

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Super place to get a pizza. There are no tables inside, only the oven and cash machine. Pizza is made just in front of your eyes, which also means you might need to wait ~20 minutes. You can get a number and walk around, bring the number ‚Ä¶

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Wood fired pizza.. we got the tartufo and it was super delicious! The staff were really nice and had lots of suggestions for us. Pizza came out really fast and it was super light and crisp. Would definitely come back!

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Coming from a New Yorker . . . this was the best pizza we had in Amsterdam!  Owners/girls were extremely friendly, and each pie was made fresh to order.  Great location to sit outside and eat your "pizza pie" and connect to free WiFi.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Chill takeaway pizza at a great location. No real seating if you happen to be touring the city, as it's designed for takeaway, but the quality is still excellent for what it is. Recommended!

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Really good pizza! They make the pizzas in front of you. They were also nice enough to customize the pizzas to make it vegan. ‚Ä¶

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Amsterdam has a number of truly excellent pizzerie and this is not one of them. Prices are as high as the competition but no prime ingredients like mozzarella di bufala. The thin crust is just disappointing and the tomato sauce is just out of a can. Go to ‚Äòsotto‚Äô or ,al fuoco vivo‚Äô instead.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Giovanni makes the best pizza in the world. The dough is crusty, slim and wood oven baked. The filling is the best of fresh ingredients. It‚Äôs a true Roman pizza. It‚Äôs a take away, but with a balcon with stools for 5 people. Definitely worth popping in. Un abbracio Giovanni sei il migliore. Bravissimo. Mel and Davide

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: I didn't like the pizza. It had good ingredients and all, but it was just a saucy pizza with patches of cheese, very small patches. Maybe next time I'll order something besides the margherita to get more flavors?

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Great stone baked pizzas at a good price. Staff are friendly, prep time is quick. You can see your pizza get made!

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: They work hard to keep their waiting time down, but popular as they are still require the occasional 20 min wait. Great pizza, good price, no seating past a few stools.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Our experience was not so good. we had a nice pizza "sofia" all ok, tasty. also we eat a "tartufi con coppa di parma" and black truffel it's just not there. we ask about it and they said was "in the sauce". well in the sauce could be ‚Ä¶

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Pizza fantastica! So far the most authentic and best pizza in Amsterdam. All locations are great. My fav is the one in the jordaan on a sunny day

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Stopped in for a light lunch and everything was great! Had the calabrese and margherita pizzeta mezzaluna. They were fresh, delicious and perfectly sized for lunch. Price was good. And service was very friendly and fast.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text:
Pizza toppings were tastey and fresh. Base was thin and too crispy/fragile.
Also took a while to come out of the kitchen and nowhere to sit in.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: I like that the pizza is light and pretty Italian. It's affordable too. It's a tiny space inside so sit along the canal!

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: My Margherita was really tasty, but one or two more vegan/vegetarian options would be appreciated. ‚Ä¶

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Excellent authentic pizza. Get it to go on a pretty day and eat it sitting on the side of a canal. Perfection!

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Quiet spot for lunch or take away on the canals.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: It's a tiny place with no tables yet no one even looked or acknowledged us for five minutes. And the when I asked for some service, they said they were too busy. Needless to say there are far better places in Amsterdam for pizza.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: They make the greatest pizzas

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Stumbled upon this place on my way back to my hotel from the Anne Frank house. Amazing pizza, and very friendly staff. Will be back before I head back to Canada

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Amazing pizzas, I have just tried 3 different topings! You will not regret visiting this place ;)

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Great take away pizza for couples or families. It was my kids favorite place, on a trip where they couldn't agree on anything food-wise.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Very tasty pizza! Quickly made, in a wood fired oven, I really enjoyed it!

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: It has a napoli style, light and crusty pizza. Cheese was fresh and igredients was optimal.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Pizza was amazing, staff very friendly, did take about 10 mins longer than expected, but this was during a pizza period so totally understandable.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: The pizza is regular taste and is not that good. Also took more than 45 minutes... It does not worth the waiting... I recomend Il Sogno or Mazzo... Better pizza, better experience!

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text:
Really tasty, thin, crispy pizzas! With an ice cold peroni and a spot just by the water..
Perfect.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Great pizza cooked in wood fire oven.  Very friendly service by Italian store manager Stephen

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: This shop should have people queuing around the block! Thin , crispy and packed with fresh, quality ingredients. Delicious. Go!

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Great pizza! Tasty ingredients and reasonable price.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Pizzas are amazing and staff is super friendly. Top 3 best pizzerias in Amsterdam

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Great pizza. Specially the truffle one. Good to tale away and eat by the canal

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Awesome pizza, with Italian homemade vibe. Great taste!

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Stopped in to grab a pizza for the horrendous line to get into the Anne Frank House. Pizza was great and service was better.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Quick service, great Italian pizza with fresh toppings! Lovely tiramisu!

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Lovely pizza's, freshly made and high quality toppings

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Yummy pizza, great price and super fast cooking time.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Absolutely brilliant. Pizza was beyond delicious and service was great.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Great Italian pizza, awesome homemade tiramisu and proper Italian coffee.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Very nice pizzas but a bit too pricey!! üçï

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Dynamite pizza! Very very good. Prices are high but acceptable by Amsterdam standards.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Freshly made and amazing .. Light thin crust fresh mozzarella cheese simple and tasty

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Very good pizza with a good dough. It seems to be in an Italian pizzeria. Good good good

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Pizzas nicely cooked with good ingredients - a   little too expensive for takeaway pizza

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Really nice pie, worth the stop. Grab it for take away and eat by the canal as inside is too small.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Freshly baked pizzas that taste great but for a price

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Trendy place that is very popular, we had some very good pizza here

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: I got a piece of metal wire in my pizza. No apologies from the staff or will to make it right. Watch out!

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Probably the best pizza I have ever had üçï

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: It's a shame the best pizza in Amsterdam has closed

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Friendly warning, there is no bathroom for customers.  Cute place and thin crust pizza.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Delicious pizza .. friendly staff .. good service

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: High quality pizza made in wooden stove.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: The best pizza of Amsterdam with quality service

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Fast service and tasty Italian style pizza.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: It used to be delicious, but now is not. Is not the same quality. Big disappointment.

Review Text: Best pizza in Amsterdam! Must have

Review Text: (Translated by Google) On the boat, in the park or in the garden, on the terrace, it's all possible with the delicious pizzas from Da Portare Via. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Perfect ! The pizzas are excellent, and the word is weak! The pizzaiolo are super nice, they speak French English and are Italian, all this leads to an address to be kept safe :) ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Long wait, but to be expected on a Friday night. Pizzas are freshly prepared and tasty vegan options! ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Pizza also good for Italian standards. Thin dough and not at all heavy. Margherita 8.5euro ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Best pizza in all Amsterdam and by far, the welcome is warm, wood oven, fresh product, everything is perfect ... I highly recommend :-) ‚Ä¶
